title: Loss prevention failure
body:
Last night i was playing a game of ranked, there were many people on both teams that did not connect due to a server issue. Our team ended up losing this game yet it said loss prevented so i was happy. In fact the loss prevented game still counted as a loss and due to that loss i feel it has altered my real deserved rank for the season, i feel that i played at at-least a silver standard but yet it put me in bronze III with the loss prevented acting as a loss still. Can someone please explain this to me because i'm sure the meaning of "Loss Prevented" would refer to the loss not actually being a loss.

Pls Rito {{item:3070}} {{item:2050}}

replies.body:
This sounds like an account issue, I would recommend contacting player support ASAP.

-SumCoolAid

Other people have also been getting this. May be a coding issue, with the way Loss Prevented matches are handled if they're in their placements (which arguably don't occur often enough in a normal situation to call for a bug fix).
